duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and coordinate all Asset Protection functions to achieve maximum shrink prevention and protection of company assets.
Ensure the effectiveness of Asset Protection policies and procedures through compliance assessments and use of exception reporting.
Provide constant review of informational resources to uncover losses through procedural auditing.
Coordinate special assessments, tests, and inspections as directed by their supervisor.
Investigate ORC theft and bring to a successful resolution.
Effectively manage regional travel and resources.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in related field or equivalent experience
